public class EventPin
extends Pin
    The Event class definition. Event is a child class of the PinData. Location is a type of PinData.

    • Method Detail

      • setContent

        public void setContent​(java.lang.String content)
        Overridden mutator method for the content instance variable. This is so that the event date data is displayed within the content. This way a user can see the dates on the frontend.
        Overrides:
        setContent in class Pin
        Parameters:
        content - The content of the event.

      • setStartDate

        public void setStartDate​(java.lang.String startDate)
        Overridden mutator method for the startDate instance variable. Conducts cleaning on the parameter.
        Overrides:
        setStartDate in class Pin
        Parameters:
        startDate - The begin date of the event.
